data: This order set is intended for FEES Certified Speech-Language Pathologist prior to Insertion of Scope

Referring provider to evaluate contraindications prior to ordering fiberoptic endoscopic evaluation of swallowing exam (FEES): Do not proceed with the PowerPlan if the following contraindications are present: 
 - - Not able to sit upright for approximately 30 minutes
- Not able to follow 1 step commands 
- Medical conditions (e.g., vasovagal episodes or history of fainting, cardiac instability) 
- Recent trauma to nasal cavity and/or surrounding tissues/structures 
- Craniofacial anomalies  
- Bilateral obstruction of the nasal passages or nasopharyngeal stenosis
- Bleeding disorders, severe/life threatening epistaxis or high risk of epistaxis  
- Anticoagulated patient  
- Presence of an in-situ nasogastric tube in infants and young children 
- Severe agitation and possible inability to cooperate with the examination
- Severe movement disorders (e.g., dyskinesia)
0.2 mL, mucous membrane, once, drug form: top liq
1 application, topical, once, drug form: Jelly
1 spray, mucous membrane,  as directed once, drug form: spray
1 spray, nasal-both , q1min PRN nasal congestion, drug form: spray
